T02TD3211E:217a-4: hr'i: yig myos pa'i 'dab ma nye ba'i bcud rnams 'dzag par gyur pa'i lce dag dang yang ni //
T02TD3211E:217a-5: de nyid blo gros skyed par byed pa la ni snying gi dbus nyid du ni bya ba yin //
T02TD3211E:217a-6: de nyid mthong du zil gnon dug 'joms byad pa chos kyi yi ge rang nyid 'bab pa ste //
T02TD3211E:217a-7: sgrol ma'i snying po 'di ni khams gsum rnam par rgyal byed shes bya snying rje'i zhing rnams kyis //
T02TD3211E:217a-8: gdams ngag gi khyad par aa bha ya las tshul khrims rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur ba'o//
